epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

epd_owner.name: Holcim (Australia) Pty Ltd
epd_owner.address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia

epd_produced_by.address: Level 3, Greenhouse, 180 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000 Australia

epd_process_certified_by.address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA

product_description.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)
product_description.product_description: Concrete prepared by mixing cement, coarse and fine aggregates, and water, with or without auxiliary agents and additives. Fresh concrete is placed on site or prefabricated, compacted and hardened by hydration of cement.

concrete_classes.normal_class: Designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths.
concrete_classes.special_class: Supplied to major construction projects including high-rise buildings, dams, spillways, roads, bridges, public works infrastructure. Includes high-strength, high-durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications.

product_description.hazardous_substances: None of the products contain substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for authorisation exceeding 0.1% by weight.
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging.

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options (modules A4-A5), modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified; scope is cradle to delivery

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight at quarry and m³ of concrete at batching plant; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible.

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered via trucks and ships without packaging

data_quality.geographic_representativeness: Good to very good for all data sources
data_quality.temporal_representativeness: All data updated within 10 years as required by PCR 2019:14

system_boundaries.upstream_processes: Raw material extraction, transport, manufacturing, electricity generation
system_boundaries.core_processes: External and internal transport, concrete manufacturing, waste and wastewater treatment
system_boundaries.downstream_processes: Distribution, installation, construction waste, deconstruction, waste transport and treatment

installation.operational_control: Holcim does not have operational control over installation
installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.activities: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation site work and forms

deconstruction.process: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

benefits_and_loads_beyond_system_boundar.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process where concrete absorbs CO2 from atmosphere through chemical reaction with hydration products
carbonation.consideration: Not included in this EPD; recommended to consider in whole-of-life building studies per BS EN 16757:2017
carbonation.impact_on_lca: Can offset CO2 emitted during cement manufacturing, reducing net emissions

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Allocated economically due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data: Default background data from LCA databases used; AusLCI dataset conforms to EN 15804 allocation rules
recycled_materials_handling.recycled_materials_in_product: No recycled material content reported in product composition

additional_info.product_safety: Classified as Non-Dangerous Goods according to Australian Code for Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail
additional_info.hazard_phrases: Listed in safety data sheet for pre-mixed concrete

contact_information.holcim_australia_address: Level 40/100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
